Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OUT_Template::__construct ( $  filename  ) 

Reads an HTML template from the given filename and stores it in in the object. See class description for instructions on creating templates.

Parameters:
string $filename Filename of template

Definition at line 105 of file Template.php.

OUT_Template::putOption ( $  option,
$  value 
)

Stores a given value as an option in the template. Tags in the template with the same tag name as the option will be replaced with the value.

Parameters:
string $option Name of the option
string $value Value of the option
Returns:
bool True on success, false otherwise

Definition at line 118 of file Template.php.

OUT_Template::replaceTag ( $  matches  )  [private]

Takes a tag that was matched in the template and replaces the entire tag with the stored value.

Acts as the callback function for regular expression replacement in the execute() function. How the function replaces the tag varies depending on what options are placed in the tag in the template.

Parameters:
array $matches Array with the matched tag and each parenthetical subpattern (given to function by preg_replace_callback)
Returns:
string Replacement string
